div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://www.whocc.no/atc
CodeDisplay
J07BD53measles, combinations with rubella, live attenuated
J07BD54measles, combinations with mumps, rubella and varicella, live attenuated
J07BDMeasles vaccines
J07BD52measles, combinations with mumps and rubella, live attenuated
J07BD01measles, live attenuated
J07BD51measles, combinations with mumps, live attenuated

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
440075005Live measles + rubella vaccine injection dose form (product)
419550004Measles + mumps + rubella + varicella vaccine (product)
386012008Measles vaccine (product)
400449000Measles virus vaccine, live, 0.5mL/vial powder for injection (product)
61153008Measles, mumps and rubella vaccine (product)
347649008Measles/mumps/rubella vaccine powder and solvent for injection solution vial (product)
419771007Measles/mumps/rubella/varicella vaccine powder and solvent for injection solution vial (product)

Include these codes as defined in ICD-11
CodeDisplay
XM28X5Measles vaccines

Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
30940-1Measles virus+Mumps virus+Rubella virus dose count in combination vaccine
